name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Python**, **Machine Learning**, and implementing **MLOps** practices. Proficient in utilizing frameworks and libraries such as **NumPy**, **Pandas**, **Scikit-Learn**, **PyTorch**, **Transformers**, **Streamlit**, and **LangChain** for building AI/ML solutions. Demonstrated experience in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure** and implementing robust **CI/CD** pipelines using tools like **MLflow** and **GitHub Actions**.

Adept at leveraging large-scale data processing with **PySpark** while employing strong statistical modeling techniques to drive predictive analytics. Skilled in frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, amidst a commitment to compliance-driven development processes aligned with industry standards. Excellent communication skills enhance collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.
